narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Coordinated Transportation Solutions, Inc. is a Transportation Broker provider based in Trumbull, CT. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $95.2M in Medicaid payments across 5.2M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $95.2M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
